The Sunway Education Wildlife Club is dedicated to raising awareness about wildlife conservation and promoting ethical environmental practices within the student body.

We believe that awareness is the first step to action. By educating students on biodiversity and the threats facing wildlife, we aim to inspire a generation that actively protects nature.
